title: [1.4.6][SSP]CJB Mods 1.4.6小更新
author: kenvsgun
txt_content:
更新日誌：
[size=11.818181991577148px][size=11.818181991577148px]MINECRAFT兼容1.4.6[size=11.818181991577148px] 
[size=11.818181991577148px][size=11.818181991577148px]移除MOD[size=11.818181991577148px] 
[size=11.818181991577148px][size=11.818181991577148px]刪除了X-射線MOD[size=11.818181991577148px] 
[size=11.818181991577148px][size=11.818181991577148px]移除的項目MOD [size=11.818181991577148px]移除
[size=11.818181991577148px][size=11.818181991577148px]移除QuickCraftMod
[size=11.818181991577148px][size=11.818181991577148px]瞬移Mod[size=11.818181991577148px]秘籍
[size=11.818181991577148px]

[size=11.818181991577148px]CJB, on 21 December 2012 - 03:44 PM, said:
I couldn't resist myself, so here is a small update for 1.4.6. It only took me 5 mins to make these mods works. Chat, Measures, MoreInfo, Minimap and ItemSpawner

And a shoutout to Harrison_TOM for updating a the full mod pack. Also Tom, you are allowed to make a new topic I'll make sure that there will be a link in OP to your topic.


CHANGELOG:
Compatible with Minecraft 1.4.6
Removed Cheats Mod
Removed X-Ray Mod
Removed Items Mod
Removed QuickCraft Mod
Removed Teleport Mod


CJB Mods v6.6.0 for 1.4.6
requires Forge or ModLoader[size=11.818181991577148px]CJB Mods v6.6.0 for 1.4.6[size=11.818181991577148px]requires Forge or ModLoader[size=11.818181991577148px]ReadMe
